content: and your home happy crocheting krystal this pattern and its images are copyright protected and the sole property of eco-minded stitches please do not redistribute transfer or sell the pattern or alter it to claim as your own you may sell any products you create from this pattern please credit the designer by linking online listings www ecomindedstitches com or tagging @ecomindedstitches #ecomindedstitches c 2021 eco-minded stitches i d love to see what you ve created hashtag #ecomindedstitches raverly ecomindedstitch instagram eco minded stitches facebook https //www facebook com/eco- minded-stitches questions or comments ecomindedstitches@gmail com c 2021 eco-minded stitches
